news.content: Received Graduate Merit Scholarship (Awarded to top incoming graduate students) from Korea University.
Received Grand Prize (1st Place) in Capstone Design Project at SEOULTECH.
Will join Korea University as an Integrated MA-Ph.D student.
Received a Full Scholarship for the best grades from SEOULTECH.
Received Gold Award at 2023 SEOULTECH Patent Camp.

publications.title: A Survey of LLM Quantization for Edge device

publications.venue: The Institute of Electronics and Information Engineers (IEIE), 2025 (Poster)

publications.title: [Project] Spiking-NeuLF: A Low-Power Spiking Neural Light Field Model
